name: Vanadius
description:
In Vanadius, you take on the role of a robot, solving action-packed puzzles in an interconnected world.

   *Explore the world, which contains plenty of puzzles and additional challenges

   *Puzzle and dodge your way through 140+ rooms

   *Sneak by enemies and avoid getting caught

   *Find out more about the world through exploration

   *Constant checkpoints for a somewhat stress-free experience

This is my first game, so any feedback would be appreciated!
